definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: How good, I love the boy he also loved me.
sentences.chinese: 多好，我深爱的少年他也深爱着我。

sentences.english: How good, I love the boy he also loved me.
sentences.chinese: 多好，我深爱的少年他也深爱着我。

sentences.english: You will also face heartbreak and abandonment by those you love.
sentences.chinese: 你同样吸烟削尖削尖时刻以及你深爱的人的抛弃。

sentences.english: Losing someone you love is a painful experience.
sentences.chinese: 失往你深爱的人是非常痛苦的遭遇。

sentences.english: I know I don"t deserve You".
sentences.chinese: 我是为了谁来深爱着你？

sentences.english: Beacause the one that you love. Has pushed you away.
sentences.chinese: 因为你深爱的人把你狠狠拒绝了。

sentences.english: A mousy librarian inherits her father's beloved but failing old movie house.
sentences.chinese: 懦弱的图书馆工作员继承了她父亲深爱的电影院。

sentences.english: You will also face heartbreak  and abandonmen t by those youlove.
sentences.chinese: 你同样会面临心碎时刻以及你深爱的人的抛弃。

sentences.english: Commemorates those who we never requiting deep love.
sentences.chinese: 纪念那些我们不求回报的深爱。

sentences.english: This man who loved liberty died in 1995 and his work has taken flight the world over.
sentences.chinese: 这个深爱自由的人于1995年去世。

sentences.english: They don't know, they all love each other.
sentences.chinese: 他们都不知道，他们都深爱着彼此。

sentences.english: We’ll stand with the families who loved them.
sentences.chinese: 我们也将与深爱着他们的家人站在一起。

sentences.english: "Brokeback Mountain" describes a story of "deeply love".
sentences.chinese: 《断臂山》讲述了一个关于“深爱”的故事。

sentences.english: I start arrogantly , can love by your such depth.
sentences.chinese: 我开始骄傲，能被你这样深爱着。

sentences.english: Look forward to the day to hold my marriage is that I love the boy.
sentences.chinese: 期待有一天牵我步入婚姻殿堂的是那个我深爱的少年。

pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2

definition: in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to fall in love with/to be in love with
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
to stay together/to rely on one another
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
